name: Italianate
description:
ITALIANATE

A horror/thriller text adventure for the ZX Spectrum 48K

by Andy McDermott © 2022

Newlywed couple Cally and Mike Baker are honeymooning in the Italian region of Tuscany, touring the region to experience its beautiful scenery and architecture. On the spur of the moment while driving to their next hotel, they decide to stop and have an evening meal in the isolated walled village of Belcarne.

It is a decision they will soon regret...

As Cally, you have to find your missing husband and uncover the terrifying secret of the village - before you suffer a nightmarish fate!
